title:
Bhabha-like scattering in the Rarita-Schwinger model at finite
  temperature
authors: M. C. Ara\'ujo, J. G. Lima, J. Furtado, and T. Mariz
abstract:
In this paper, we study a Bhabha-like scattering in a massive
Rarita-Schwinger model at finite temperature. The analysis is conducted at the
tree level and addresses temperature effects through the thermofield dynamics
formalism. We consider the usual fermion-antifermion into fermion-antifermion
scattering and compute the cross-section in order to investigate the influence
of the finite temperature effects.
